original_text:
My tongue will tell of your righteous acts
    all day long,
for those who wanted to harm me
    have been put to shame and confusion.
korean_text: 나의 혀도 종일토록 주의 공의를 작은 소리로 읊조리오리니 나를 모해하려 하던 자들이 수치와 무안을 당함이니이다

sentences.original_text: My tongue will tell of your righteous acts
sentences.korean_translation: 내 혀는 주의 의로운 행위를 말하리니

sentences.original_text: for those who wanted to harm me
have been put to shame and confusion
